Reviews.Content: I chose this item because of the product name....and I totally think the camera is a piece of junk, as it takes forever to focus on zoom which leads me to think it has low quality mechanics actually sub par for the prose of it.....I would NOT recommend this camera to anyone and I'm sorry I bought it.....after all that crying about this camera I must tell you that I have more than $4,000.00 dollars in a big unit with a few professional lens, it's light but that's all he good I can say

Reviews.Title: Great pictures
Reviews.Author: The Count
Reviews.Content: My daughter was surprised at the quality of the gift and she didn't expect such a high tech high end camera.

Reviews.Title: save your money
Reviews.Author: Gerred
Reviews.Content: I can take better pictures with my iPhone 4. The pictures are always blurry no matter what setting I use. the only time it takes good pictures is when I'm outside in bright sunlight. Even then my iPhone takes a better picture.

Reviews.Title: All the items I ordered were delivered satisfactorily. So, I feel very pleased.
Reviews.Author: Alfredo Albán B.
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because everything was all right. Moreover, the specifications of the products are excellent. You are the best.

Reviews.Title: I may never buy Nikon again.
Reviews.Author: Five-o
Reviews.Content: Nikon at one time had good low end cameras. Well this camera is ok but that is about all cheap built no frills basic or less than basic camera better to add more money and buy a more advanced model. Fujifilm cameras in the same price range are twice as good. This camera has no view finder and it is very slow at focusing and at a distance it won't focus at all. It don't feel good in my grip and that to me is very important. I won't send it back I don't want someone else to get it so I plan to smack it with a big rock. It's that junky!!

Reviews.Title: eccelente product
Reviews.Author: Grace Gonzalez R
Reviews.Content: This product is very economical, easy to use, comfortable to carry and saves energy.The size is special for travel and works.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera ! It takes amazing pictures and it's not that hard to figure out ! A goo buy for sure !

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for any price
Reviews.Author: Clinton Cimring "Dr. Clinton"
Reviews.Content: I own a Nikon Coolpix P90, which I paid $600 for and I would say that this model is on par with that.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Hilda Watts "BRC FAN"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a new camera and I thought the color red was awesome but much to my surprise I took 50 pictures the first time and last time I used it and 30 were blurry, these were inside with the flash on.  I like the button to put the flash up as my Kodak's flash is always up.  I don't like that the batteries and scan disc were in the same compartment and it was hard t open and close. I didn't think it has a smooth zoom out and the side zoom I didn't like as much as the top one.  The camera is a nice size and weight but it's not for me.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work!
Reviews.Author: Victor Somerfeld
Reviews.Content: The package was OK, but inside the camera box was opened. The camera was not a brand new since it had some evidencies of use, including some pictures, the zoom didn't work at all and the shooter button didn't work neither. I asked Amazon for a refund, this is the first time that this happened to me with a Amazon's product, but this is certainly a product in bad conditions. They shouldn't offer products like that.

Reviews.Title: Not a good camera
Reviews.Author: Lucas Vieira
Reviews.Content: I bought it thinking that, as a nikon, it would be great, even with the low price.But it surprised me, the picture focus doesn't work properly, really slow, and to top it up, it uses four AA alkaline batterries.

Reviews.Title: Not for me....
Reviews.Author: kim
Reviews.Content: I am pretty finicky when it comes to cameras. This was my first Nikon purchase and I just don't like it. You have to hold this camera very still in order to get a clear pic. It's almost too lightweight for me, bounces around too easily. Do not like that you need to open cap to review pictures. Gave this to my husband and bought another CanonPower which I have always been happy with.

Reviews.Author: Ross H.
Reviews.Content: 5* TkU - excellent product, most bang for your buck. I have tried the rest - I think this is the best.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix l810
Reviews.Author: BONNIE RATLIFF
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASE THE NIKON DIGITAL CAMERA AFEW MONTHS AGO. I HAD A KODAK EASYSHARE DIGITAL CAMERA FOR 15 YEARS SO I THOUGHT IT WAS TIME FOR A NEW CAMERA . I WAS VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THE NIKON CAMERA , OUT OF THE 50 PICTURES I HAVE TAKEN ONLY ABOUT 10 COME OUT CLEAR , THE OTHER PICTURES WERE BLURRY AND RED.  THE LENS SHUTTER WOULD NOT WORK PROPERLY,KEEP GETTING STUCK.I WENT BACK TO USING MY KODAK CAMERA . IF I PURCHASE ANOTHER CAMERA IT WON'T BE NIKON.WHEN I RETURNED THE NIKON CAMERA I WAS CHARGED $37.50 ON RESTOCK FEE PLUS SHIPPING , THAT COME TO ALMOST FIFTY DOLLARS .

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera does EVERYTHING
Reviews.Author: Giovanna Keslar
Reviews.Content: Very easy to handle and use - fabulous pictures & movies! Well worth the price - love the red casing - stands out. EXCELLENT!

Reviews.Title: my sister love it
Reviews.Author: icy
Reviews.Content: i got this for my sister as her birthday present and she love it.the thing she love the most beside the color red is the zoom in feature.we used it for our road trip and am very impressed with the quality.

Reviews.Title: Never Ever buy this
Reviews.Author: Hank
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift for Christmas 2013.  We took it to Europe and I was sadly disappointed with the quality of pictures.  Super Slow to focus and when using the Zoom you will get VERY poor pictures.  I sent it back to Nikon and got it back and it was the same (maybe worse).  This is an extremely poor example of Nikon quality.  Still waiting for a software update, glad I bought a Canon to replace this camera.

Reviews.Title: nikon quality
Reviews.Author: steve moseley
Reviews.Content: daughter was taking photography class, this camera was far and away the best for the price , Nikon lenses are the best on the market, even my professional photographer friend was impressed , even his non, Nikon cameras have Nikon lenses , best glass there is if your new to photography, buy nikon

Reviews.Title: hello it's 2014, none automatic flash?
Reviews.Author: JimBo
Reviews.Content: great camera, takes great pics. You have to tell it when you want to use flash. (fill in outdoors or iffy situations)

Reviews.Title: Great camera, easy to use, takes excellent photos!
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: Great camera! Easy to use, beautiful color and design. Got this camera for my mom for Christmas so she could take pics of her grandchildren and she loves it! It took her a little while to get used to the image stabilizer, but once she did, she started taking pictures like crazy! Very pleased with this purchase!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix
Reviews.Author: Eldridge Williams
Reviews.Content: The camera was shipped and received in perfect condition with all the accessories. It was purchased as a gift for my daughter and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpik L180 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 26x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass...
Reviews.Author: terrihelgeson
Reviews.Content: I give this 5 out of 5. It has excellent zoom, and short range. It has also short range and close up action and still shots too. Compare to my old Minolta XG7 it takes great pictures. I do miss the days though of doing the old black and white photos and being able to work in the darkroom and developing my own photos and working and using an enlarger, superimposing things in black and white, playing around with images. Those are the bygone days.

Reviews.Title: small inconvenience
Reviews.Author: Coni Nelson
Reviews.Content: Love the pictures, etc.  Must make yourself wait between pictures to take next because otherwise you can't edit the photos.When sensors stop flashing you can take another photo.  A little hindering.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: maria cecilia talavera saguier
Reviews.Content: all I wanted. easy to use. is fast. it doesn't consume much battery.i'm still learning about some of the features.i'm loving it

Reviews.Title: Loved it!!
Reviews.Author: Angelina
Reviews.Content: this camera is pretty handy! it came on time and actually before the estimate date which is awesome!Unfortunately, i got this for my loved one, and it was the wrong one ...lol but it works fine! and from what i hear the packaging was safe!

Reviews.Title: Very good.
Reviews.Author: Franco Viviano
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and recording quality. Zoom's also good. Only drawback: uses AA batteries, which can be bothersome sometimes since most batteries won't last longer than one day. But still don't regret buying it. Excellent choice!

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: carla
Reviews.Content: good camera for begginers. I wanted to try out my photographer skills and this was helpful. for fun and family memories

Reviews.Title: poor camera for me
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: Not good for kids.  Takes to long to take pics.  After only a year, had a lens malfunction and just purchased a different camera as it is about 100 dls to fix.  Decided to go with a smaller faster camera.  But it does take some nice pics.

Reviews.Title: A good solid camera
Reviews.Author: Phurface "Phurface"
Reviews.Content: Great pictures but could use a manual setting for timed exposures.  Good battery life and pictures easily transfer from the SD card to any PC.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: likely author
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my mom as a gift for my sister for Christmas. The smile on her face was priceless. Not to mention the fact that my brother wanted a camera for Christmas also and got the same camera. It was a true kodak moment to see them open the boxes and pull out a camera and it was exactly what they wanted. I'm still seeing flashing lights from all the pictures they have taken.

Reviews.Title: never buy a camera on the internet
Reviews.Author: K. Edw Lynch "BluesNut"
Reviews.Content: Zoom control is clunky and jerky...  auto focus is a joke.  picture quality when it is in focus is OK.  Purchased because I expected better from the brand name and because it uses AA batteries instead of those god-awful proprietary in-camera rechargeable expensive to replace batteries...

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!
Reviews.Author: Kaye
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. It is perfect for the person who wants a good point and shoot camera. I usually leave mine set on automatic as I chase the grandkids trying to get them still long enough for a clear shot. But for the person who likes to try different settings, it has a lot of them. Great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS CAMERA!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Vee Daniels
Reviews.Content: The best I have ever had! It takes great pics, and the video quality is FABULOUS!!! I bought this as a gift to myself (Dec. 2012), and I am soooo happy that I did! I especially LOVE that now I can ZOOM in without blur at my son's annual winter concerts; makes me feel as if I am up close and personal. Hahaha!!This is a really great buy!

Reviews.Title: Bad Costomer Service
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: Bought this last year and for Christmas gift, zoom tore up in June 2013, sent back for repair.  Got it back and later noticed that flash would not work in low light or at night. Sent back in before 1 year warranty ran out, when we got it back it had a note attached to it saying that a liquid had gotten into camera and it is beyond repair. Also said that warranty was void because of liquid. The camera still takes pictures, just no flash. I complained and they investigated and found it was not covered by warranty.  Looks like to me that if it gotten wet, nothing would work. gave 2 stars because camera takes good pics, just not going to hold up and Nikon doesn't want to keep repairing it. Just tell you the warranty is void, thank you for purchasing Nikon and have a nice day.

Reviews.Title: Upgrading my older camera
Reviews.Author: H.K.W. "Harriet"
Reviews.Content: My daughter bought this model and loves it.  I wanted a camera with a lot of optical zoom and more mps than my old camera.  I will begin using it Christmas.  I use my camera for taking reference shots for oil paintings.  The zoom lets me get closeups without going to the computer.  I just print them out and they're ready to paint.The only thing I would improve on it the 3" viewing screen.  There is no protection for it, no cover like my old camera had.

Reviews.Title: Returned it and bought a canon instead.  Much happier with the Canon.
Reviews.Author: TSSI Customer Service - Jesse R.
Reviews.Content: Very difficult to take good pics.  Returned it and bought a canon instead.  The canon takes much better pictures than this nikon.

Reviews.Title: Nikon L810
Reviews.Author: Johnny Royal
Reviews.Content: Has done everything I need a camera to do with perfect pictures. Actually posted some pictures online, got better reviews than professional photo's................ can not go wrong with this camera

Reviews.Title: Excited
Reviews.Author: Cindy Weber
Reviews.Content: We are purchasing this for our daughter for Christmas. We played with it a little after it arrived and it seemed to be just what she needs to get started. We are very excited to see her open it come Christmas morning.

Reviews.Title: The camera have problems!!!
Reviews.Author: Aldo Perinetto
Reviews.Content: I received this product the 21th November 2013 and 10 days after, the camera  stopped working.I turn on the  display and all is in blank........... it's my worst experience in acquiring products

Reviews.Title: Great photos - not so great for video.
Reviews.Author: Oz resident
Reviews.Content: I've owned this camera for just over a year now. If you allow it to focus, it takes magnificent photos. I took photos of my daughter's wedding just a few days after receiving the camera. My photos were mostly indistinguishable from those taken by the professional photographer they hired. I used it a few months later to take some beautiful photos on Vieques Island. My only complaint is the audio when using the camera to record video. The tiny built-in microphones have a poor low end, making everything sound thin. My cell phone records better audio. I wish it had some way to hook in external microphones. I do have a digital audio recorder I could use to record the audio and then sync it with the video, but what a pain. Oh well, for the price I guess you can't have everything.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this purchase. My daughter loves it and has been taking many wonderful pictures of the family and of nature!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: Roberto Torres
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived on time. item is a refurbished one and it certainly looks like new without a single scratch and it works well.

Reviews.Title: Love this Nikon Coolpix!
Reviews.Author: Estrellita
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with the Nikon Coolpix camera!  We've had it for some time now and I love the great zoom, as well as the ease of use.  My husband is a bird lover, and he can take great pictures of his feathery friends with it. :-)  It can be a point and shoot, or you can make a more advanced camera with all the adjustments.  A great all-around camera for us!

Reviews.Title: Not a Bad Camera!
Reviews.Author: C. Reeves "Bargain Seeker"
Reviews.Content: I am neutral on this camera.  I return it because I wanted a better quality camera.  This camera took great pictures but I wanted something that performed more than this one did.  I would recommend this as a gift to a high school student.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Mario León
Reviews.Content: This camera is Goooooooooooood product. Only changues the alcalines batt's with a rechargables (AA) and run marvelous.The Camera is rate as Semiprof!!! the pictures are high quality.

Reviews.Title: SNAPSHOT PERFECT!
Reviews.Author: B. Young
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect camera for snapshots .  It's convenient to hold with a nice grip, buttons are logical and easy to learn.  The flash is better than most point and shoots.  I consider this a great vacation camera!

Reviews.Title: As promised
Reviews.Author: Eric Taylor
Reviews.Content: Performs as expected. Great point and shoot, nice range of ISO, quick focus and clear pictures. I would recommend, especially for the price point.

Reviews.Title: So far, great choice
Reviews.Author: Simon
Reviews.Content: Bought as a birthday gift, to replace a damaged one. Great viewing, pretty easy to use with quality pictures. Currently awaiting more usage to give a real determined answer.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!!
Reviews.Author: Danielle Parry
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday, and really likes it. I often find myself at times stealing his camera to take pictures. Pictures come out great, have never had a bad picture with this camera. Lots of great features and setting that make it easy to take the perfect picture.

Reviews.Title: Excelent!!!
Reviews.Author: Victoria Bagnulo
Reviews.Content: Excelent product. When  arrives at my country arrives in a verry good backpack and very secured, the camera is excellent. I didnt find any problem in it and its amazing, it works very quickly and it takes excelent pictures and records video verry good.For me is 4 stars!!!.About the attention of the store that i bought is excellent, because i sent a email asking for a thing and they answer me in 30 minutes!!. Excellent attention and very good product.!!!

Reviews.Title: Darn good
Reviews.Author: D.Courtade
Reviews.Content: Its a great camera, the zoom is insane, my only complaint is that I cannot do time-lapses with it. Also user beware it doesnt not come with a cord to hook up to your computer to download your pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: HikingInSierras
Reviews.Content: Not quite a full-SLR, but not a basic point-and-shoot either.  So far image and reliability have both been good.  AAA-battery power supply makes battery change-out easy and less costly than OEM packs.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Tess Marque
Reviews.Content: I just got the Nikon Coolpix L810 and I love it. It shipped fast I had it in 3 days. So much bang for the buck. I highly recommend this easy to use attractive camera. It is lightweight and takes great pics, even in low light. the 26x zoom is such a great added bonus on this camera. I give it two thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: layla
Reviews.Content: This product arrived in great condition and arrived pretty quickly.  The only problem I had with this is, it is only chargeable through batterys?? Which I was not aware of an there are too many cord with no explanation .

Reviews.Title: I takes really cool pictures
Reviews.Author: Pablo Cabrera
Reviews.Content: I not sure if it is m camara or the model, but the screen doesnt look very good while taking pictures. When you take them they look much better than while looking into what you will take the picture of.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Xavier Montalvan
Reviews.Content: It's very good camera and how will flash as I like, worth the price come with 4 batteries ready for testing!

Reviews.Title: It Was Not What I Expected.
Reviews.Author: RomeMonroe
Reviews.Content: When I First Started Using This Nikon Camera Pictures Would Come Out Blurry and Shadowy.When I You Flash The Pictures Would Also Come Out Black. I'm Not To Fond Of This Camera. Rating 3

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Sibylle Kristensen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a first camera for my 12 year old who is really into photography. She loves it - and she took it to the amazon rain forest and took some amazing pictures. very well worth the investment

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Patterson "Barbara" "bookluver"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a gift .  It is being widely used.  The pictures are clear, sharp and very colorful.  Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: coolpix
Reviews.Author: april giannotti
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for casual picture taking.Its easy to use, pictures look great,  and so much fun to use.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: Vermont
Reviews.Content: Hi i loved this Camera so I bought it again for my Dad.. It's great quality.. easy to use.. and came very quickly and i loved these folks..

Reviews.Title: Just ok for the price
Reviews.Author: Wise Spent
Reviews.Content: Manufacture software malfunction. It always asks to enter/update time and date. Can live with it but just not so great.

Reviews.Title: I DONT LIKE!!!
Reviews.Author: Melly
Reviews.Content: The video was amazing... looks nicer outside because of the heavy lighting... but... pictures sucks so bad!!! I wanted to return it... but It's alright... but not the pictures they don't look better then my 50 dollar camera from sony... geez I guess I'll use it for recording and use my other for pictures... :p

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: timothy johnson
Reviews.Content: takes very nice pics... zoom is awesome.. very economical for this high rate of zoom. it is a very nice buy

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: james herbert
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife and she loves it. Great pictures just point and shoot. Even better pictures once she learned how to utilize some of the settings. Would recommend to any and everyone.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: So far I am very happy with the camera.  The photos are amazing quality and the 720p video is a nice bonus.  I am still learning how to use many of the features but feel confident that I will soon be a competent photographer.

Reviews.Title: was everything I wanted!t
Reviews.Author: taunnie l. russell
Reviews.Content: Came when ordered! good buy for  the money!  would highly recommend! Easy to use directions!  light weight! just love it!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Emma Steele
Reviews.Content: awesome camera...haven't used it much yet but will during the school session this year, what I have seen so far...Its great....

Reviews.Title: very pleased with camera and sorely disappointed with strap...
Reviews.Author: D. Pawl "Dani"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and the crisp photos and film footage it takes. The sound is good on short video clips and the technology gives you the possibility to choose various settings for photography and documentation. As of late, I took this camera out and shot a bunch of great photos of the moonrise. It turned out great even though the light was soft and diminished. My only complaint is the strap that comes with this camera. That is the reason I ultimately had purchase a new camera (I owned the same model). The strap has plastic clips to ensure that the camera is steadily kept in place. They slip off and when they do your camera will come tumbling after! I ended up stitching the strap on for either side. Feeling more secure now.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: JETCycling
Reviews.Content: Good Camera for a beginner.  Not recommended for action shots or fast moving pictures, but can be use for portraits.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Samuel Andujar
Reviews.Content: very good  i love  and i will  shop more things when i can. thanks  very much to help us .

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Arlene Carlson
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great pictures. The only negative is that this, as with all point and shoot, the zoom is only  in complete focus, if you don't zoom out as far as it is suppose to.I did take picures at the Fireworks and put it on a tripod and got some awesome pictures. I give it a thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: I like enjoyed using the camera, I still have to learn a bit more about it
Reviews.Author: Deborah Markos
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera, I took it on vacation and it really took some nice shots for me I can not wait to use it with my new granddaughter

Reviews.Title: Great camara
Reviews.Author: Marco
Reviews.Content: Great, very happy with this item Nikon COOLPIX L810 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 26x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass -...on time delivery thank you.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Pat Antosh
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for to give as a gift to my granddaughter who is interested in studying photography

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Yulexy Guedez
Reviews.Content: I take a excellent choice with this camera!! it's easy to use, it's practical and I Really love it! It has a multiple opcion of to take pictures! I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect!!
Reviews.Author: Samanta Guerra
Reviews.Content: I am really happy with it, I take nice photos, enjoy the time taking photosThe camara is perfect for person who want semi pro photos

Reviews.Title: GREAT EXPERIENCE
Reviews.Author: Leanne K. Dresner
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product on a Saturday night and received it from the seller Tuesday morning. It was easy to start up, the manual had a lot of good tips, and my pictures are coming out very clear. I would recommend this stylish camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Vittoria Del Rosario "Giggles_0_10"
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing. It has way too many settings for what I need but the picture quality is amazing. I picked this camera because of the pixel to price ratio. Even without the flash, if there is some light, I can take a picture of my dark yard and the tree looks illuminated like 10AM. Focus to actual taking the picture is a bit slow but according to other reviewers I will get faster at that as I get used to it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Brittani Stewart
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting this camera for a very long time and finally gave in to purchasing it when it went on sale. I'm so glad I did. I have to get used to carrying around a larger camera but it takes such beautifully clear pictures. What I love the most is that you can get an awesome shot from so far away. Also, using the zoom feature I never have issues taking window pictures... even when there is dirt on the window, the camera zooms right past it to the money shot.

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: joan m sisk
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, so happy with my purchase! Takes a little getting used to as far as the focus but once you figure it out you are good to go!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth M Swackhammer
Reviews.Content: I am older, and like to take pictures. With this camera I get a good quality picture with out a lot of things that I must remember to tell my camera with settings.Thanks for a simple to use good camera.

Reviews.Title: She loved it!
Reviews.Author: Cecil Courtois
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my girlfriend for her birthday since the last camera I bought for her broke. This camera was way more expensive than the last one and she couldn't be happier with the choice I made. As soon as she saw it, she fell in love with it. Also it's a great camera. Takes some of the best photo's I've ever seen. Yet another great product at an even better price.

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera
Reviews.Author: kelwin
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, but if you are on a budget this camera will be great for you, thanks!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Zac Flint
Reviews.Content: My wife is the pic taker. She loves the clarity & zoom ability. best camera either of us have ever had.

Reviews.Title: Five Months in and I love It
Reviews.Author: Katherine Rich
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for five months and so far I love it. I bought it expecting it to be essentially a point-and-shoot camera with good clarity and a strong zoom and it has been as good or better than expected. Super easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Nickon Coolpix L810 is very cool
Reviews.Author: Debra L. Rice "Debbie R."
Reviews.Content: The camera is compact for the features it offers. Takes quality pictures and has many options for the type of photo you wish to take.There is even a special mode setting for photographing pets. Pretty simplistic and easy to handle and operate.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: odalys
Reviews.Content: Great camera, the only thing I don't like is that it operates strictly on double a batteries. I'm so used to charging my electronics.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: carolyn s.
Reviews.Content: Love the pictures this takes.  very clear. easy to download pictures and edit them. great for taklng on vacations.  love it

Reviews.Title: Is possible to use the diaphragm and the shutter manually?
Reviews.Author: Martires Castro
Reviews.Content: Is possible to use the diaphragm and the shutter manually?i want to know if i can set tthe diaphragm and the shutter by me.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Sheri
Reviews.Content: For a non-photographer like me this is a great camera for great shots! Even in my hand my daughter's wedding photo's came out awesome!

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: I bought this on an impulse and I was not disappointed but you can't really go wrong with Nikon. The zoom is nice and the fit in your hand is good.

Reviews.Title: much more camera than my old one.
Reviews.Author: Jennie Johnson
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning how to use all the features.  The only drawback is it is not as compact as my old one

Reviews.Title: Very good pics
Reviews.Author: Mariana Quagliata
Reviews.Content: I recommend to all which don't need professional ones but like good photography and enjoy as a hobby. Film is also good.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for starters
Reviews.Author: E. Gutesman "gutes"
Reviews.Content: Not very good focus. Low flash  response time. It's good for beginners  or people not interested in good photography but in things like zoom.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Awesome
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing camera. Great for a novice. When it arrived it was in great condition. I use it all the time and the clarity of my shots is stunning!

Reviews.Title: Cool Pix L810 16.1 Mega Pix.  Referbished
Reviews.Author: Steven MacMillan
Reviews.Content: So far it has performed well.  Only issue I am having is low light photos.  I flip the flash button but do not always get a flash.  Most likely operator error.  Still learning the camera.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Alyssa Hall
Reviews.Content: I love this camera I had a little trouble putting on the strap but other then that I loved it, the picture is nice and its easy to use

Reviews.Title: Lightweight
Reviews.Author: Sabado Lam
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Great results. I got the blue, nice color. Instant one button video recording. Uses 4 AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX L810
Reviews.Author: Cami
Reviews.Content: I am still learning how to use, but so far, so good.  It will probably a five once I learnall the ins and outs.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: K. Mullican
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures and easily goes from picture to editor...high res so printing 10x13 and higher is no problem. Easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Love it so far
Reviews.Author: Soleil
Reviews.Content: I've had it for a few weeks now and I absolutely love it. The zoom on the camera is what I was looking for in the first place and this one definitely delivers. I've had no issues with the lens breaking or anything like that. So right now it's a great camera and I hope it stays that way!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Brian Murray
Reviews.Content: Super easy to use and takes awesome pix. Highly recommend!!! It's actually my son's camera but I prefer to use it over my very expensive Nikon with multiple lenses.

Reviews.Title: don't focus right sometimes
Reviews.Author: Santiago Esteban Sojo
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in October and had already sold it, don't like it at all. Sometimes it's really hard to take a good picture because you can't focus the image.

Reviews.Title: CoolPix is my Pix
Reviews.Author: Kathy Jones
Reviews.Content: I really do love this purchase. I have been wanting a SLR camera for a while, but couldn't afford the high dollar cameras yet. I like Nikon branc, so this was the perfect product. I have taken some excellent pics of the moon, family and friends, etc...Great camera!

Reviews.Title: Thrilled
Reviews.Author: Gigglechick
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything I wanted it to do. The pictures are amazing and its very user friendly. I haven't stopped taking pictures since I got it.

Reviews.Title: Fantasic Camera
Reviews.Author: joannh
Reviews.Content: We are taking  cruise to Alaska and wanted a good camera to use this one will be excellent for all our needs. Can't wait to come home and have a show of our adventure!

Reviews.Title: Great for price
Reviews.Author: athphotog
Reviews.Content: Takes great quality pictures, doesn't usually blur with moving objects, and has a very good zoom for the price ($200 when it was purchased). If you are into photography and need a low cost camera, this one is for you.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix Camera
Reviews.Author: La Von A. Williams "La Von A. Williams"
Reviews.Content: I love the camera it is so wonderful and it takes really great pictures.  I really enjoy the features too.

Reviews.Title: I'm very happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: ALEJANDRO PRIETO
Reviews.Content: besides I am not a knowlege photografer the pictures taken with this camera are very nice.  Also I consider I did a good purchase because the camera was a good price and very good conditions.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Brian Covil
Reviews.Content: takes great pics and came quick. Good color and black and white pics.  took great pics of my kids. I'm happy with product.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Susan Bove'
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, but there are a few things that bother me.  One of the settings allows for a picture to be "3D."  I thought that was kind of cool; however, it doesn't work.  You have to take a picture of something, then slightly move the camera to the right and take a second picture.  This is supposed to give a 3D effect to the object.  Every time I tried this feature, a message appeared that said, "Failed to take second picture."  Out of the dozens of times I tried, I "accidentally" managed to take a 3D picture.  I say accidentally because I have no idea how the 2 successful pictures differed from the other attempts.  In viewing the picture, I didn't find that the object looked 3D like I would expect.  It just appeared to have slightly different lighting.The other thing that bothers me is that this camera cannot take sequential pictures (snap, snap, snap, snap.)  It does take video, which I like, so maybe the manufacturer felt that was enough, but I would still like to have the ability for quick picture taking.One other thing to mention is that the media storage card is located within the battery compartment.  I am hoping that frequent accessing of this compartment does not end up breaking the cover.  It doesn't seem all that well built, but I suppose time will tell.  I bought the extra warranty for this item, so at least I have back up.Other than those things, I have gotten some great pictures and I do like the camera.  I have also found the video useful in documenting my dog training clients :o)

Reviews.Title: It's a Home Run!
Reviews.Author: C. D. Marsh, Jr.
Reviews.Content: Works like my blue one.  Dependable, wish it had a base and rechargeable batteries.  Yes I know I can put rechargeable batteries in it however I still would have to open the base to recharge them.  A base that it could sit in would be better.  Then opening and closing the base wouldn't be an issue.

Reviews.Title: perfect when you don't know anything about camera
Reviews.Author: globey
Reviews.Content: It does everything like a pro and what you see is what you getthis camera is a lot more than i need and i am happy with it..

Reviews.Title: Camera Review
Reviews.Author: kimbro
Reviews.Content: I wanted a good but not too expensive camera and I got just that!! It has a lot of good features that work well. Highly recommend this camera!!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME Camera!!!!!
Reviews.Author: D.A. "Razorback Girl"
Reviews.Content: Received this item the morning of a big concert we were attending.  Was concerned that I wouldn't have enough time to familiarize myself fully with functions/features available.  The instruction booklet is well written and easy to follow, plus being the owner of a Nikon CoolPix made this easier to set up, as the primary settings are almost identical.  This camera takes wonderful pictures, especially with the zoom.  Made our concert experience one of the best we've attended, and we have so many professional looking photos to prove that.  I am not a photography buff, so am particularly pleased with the ease of operation.  Highly recommend this item to anyone wanting crisp photos without needed an encyclopedia to decipher the instructions.

Reviews.Title: Fine, fine, fine, camera.
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I was going to buy a DSLR, either Nikon or Canon, but I didn't want to carry around a clunker like that. So, I stumbled on this little guy with a big zoom lens, and it's all I need. It takes great pictures. And I only paid $150 for it (used). No warranty, but at $150, I don't have to worry too much about the investment. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Good pictures
Reviews.Author: DoodyDude
Reviews.Content: I just wanted a camera that can take normal pictures of my family. However, it can take videos as well. Picture and Video quality is awesome.

Reviews.Title: One of my hobbies is photography & I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Brianne
Reviews.Content: Takes amazing pictures, I like to bring it with me a lot of places and it is very easy to do so, not heavy at all. Came on time and came with all accessories!Except a case and a memory card of course but got both of these at Wal-mart for cheap. I am constantly showing people my camera and they are amazed that it is a used one, might as well be new and I got it for a GREAT price. My grandma and grandpa are putting their orders in for one soon. They spent just as much on their cameras from Costco and theirs broke within a year. This camera has great quality in pictures and in general. Glad I didn't have to go through the hassle of returning it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for starters
Reviews.Author: Kattia Alvarado
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera semi profesional under my budget. I got this camera and I started taking pictures. The zoom is great but you need a lot of time focusing.I thought it was faster taking pictures but I have to wait between one picture and another. (Don't like this part)I recommend this camera for people who start in the photo hobbie.The pixels are very good.

It was everything it claimed to be, easy to use and providing very clear photos. There are many others out there with better focus, clearer focus, and more bells and whistles but I think this was a good investment for my money.

My son is in baseball at the moment and I can get a clear shot all the way to the back wall from the bleachers. It  is as if I am only 2 feet away.  I have not figured out the sports shots but I am sure that operator error. This camera was a great choice!

Reviews.Title: Great camaera

Reviews.Content: This is by far the best camera of this type I have purchased. I have had several different brands and the Nikon is far superior!!!!!

Also there is not view finder (which I knew when I bought it) but still worth mentioning, because the image looks blurry on the screen.  Most of the time it turns out fine, but not all the time.  It is very difficult to see in the sun as well.  Overall a great family camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Not perfect

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for Amateur Photographers
Reviews.Author: Eric Madsen
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend who wanted to get into photography and get away from the more simplistic point and shoot style cameras.  This is a great first step without going into the larger, more expensive, devices and having to worry about lenses and such.  For those that have been trained or are more professional this may not be a great option due to the lack of view finder and some refinement of lenses, etc.  Other than that it is a great camera with simplistic use such as regular AA batteries, large vibrant screen, and great steady shot mode.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice

Reviews.Content: I ordered this product used-like new and have to say I am glad I did. The original price on this is $279. Found it used for $166 and had an amazon gift card to use up. I ended up paying $116. This camera is as beautiful as it looks and takes wonderful photos. It is not professional grade by any means but is certainly a step above many point and shoot cameras. The zoom is amazing. I am still working with some of the customization modes because I take lots of photos but the auto mode is good for the beginner who has no clue or just doesn't care. This camera does adjust for most lighting situations. Even with advanced sd card, the shutter speed is not quite as fast as my old 35mm but I am happy with my purchasePROS: Color, Zoom, Grip, Customization ChoicesCONS: Shutter Speed

Reviews.Title: This camera is great!!

Reviews.Title: very good camera

I can't wait to take it on vacation and see what quality pictures I get from it.

Reviews.Content: Nikon is our choice in cameras.We've been using Nikon cameras for the last ten years. Our family progress has been registered in beautiful photos with Nikon cameras.It is not rapid enough when we need to take an instantaneous shot.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX L810 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 26x Zoom Nikkor

Reviews.Content: This camera takes excellent stills.  Even though it takes great movies, it burns batteries as fast as the on and off button.Two movies (short ones) and two changes of batteries.  Obviously not great for movies.

Reviews.Title: Excelente

Reviews.Content: la camara es muy buena excelente lo recomiendo ampliamente Vendedor, me en-canta la Calidad de las imagenes, Definitivamente excelente product

Reviews.Title: It's pretty good just slightly slow
Reviews.Author: DJ Loademup
Reviews.Content: This camera is very nice and has all the features that I like.  The only downside that I've noticed is that it takes a good amount of time to snap a picture.  When you finally get your image in sight, you have to hope that the object doesn't move because chances are you will miss the target or have a blurry picture.  I haven't given up on the camera just yet!!  I'm still learning and seeing what I can do to take better pictures.

Reviews.Title: Not for the pro
Reviews.Author: David W Seymour
Reviews.Content: This item is consistent with previous reviews. Has a lot of great features for the price but I have experienced some issues with focus as well. I long for control like I had in the old days when I focused the lens myself. I see very little difference in all the mode settings and just stay on one or two for convenience. Not Nikon's best but great camera for the price. I'm still a Nikonian.

Reviews.Title: new camera

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L810 16.1MP Digital Camera with 26xZoom NIKKOR ED..
Reviews.Author: R. Grace
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera that was user friendly, yet a little more sophisticated than your point and click camera. I am not a photographer yet I would like for my home pictures to be quality ones that I can share with my friends and family on the Internet and Facebook. The instruction booklet was very helpful and I went through it step by step to familiarize myself with all of the settings of the camera. Having a zoom lens is wonderful and I still uitlize the "easy" setting to take pictures.  It is more bulky than the streamlined cameras that fit in your pocket but I bought a case to go with it.  I think this camera will take care of all my needs for many years and would recommend it to the novice like me!! The price was in line also.

Reviews.Title: A worthy camera to upgrade to
Reviews.Author: Serial Sonic Gamer
Reviews.Content: I picked up the Nikon Coolpix L810 to replace my old Kodak Easyshare Z740 after seeing the many great reviews for it and I do not regret the purchase one bit.  First I'd like to say that the L810 takes really good pictures and I love the 26x Zoom even though that kind of zoom won't be used a lot in my case but its good to have it just in case.  At first when I was looking for a new camera I was attracted to the Nikon Coolpix L610 for the 1080P video recording compared to the L810's 720P video recording but after doing further research I found that the L810 was an overall better camera so I was willing to compromise on HD video quality.  The things that are key to me are the camera's size (I don't want a small camera) and how it fits in my hands when using it and I'm glad to say that the L810 is just the right size for me and it fits comfortably in my hands when I'm taking photos with it.  The biggest test for the Nikon Coolpix L810 was taking photos inside my room which has the worst lighting to take photos in especially without the flash open which my old Kodak didn't do very well in.  When I took photos in my room with my Kodak camera with the flash closed the photos would always be grainy but when I took a photo with the Nikon without the flash it came out smooth which is great because some photos I take are in my room and sometimes I try not to use the flash if I can.  I did notice however that the Nikon Coolpix L810 definitely isn't a camera to take very quick shots with but that isn't too much of a problem for me since the pictures I take aren't split second shots.  Overall I think the Nikon Coolpix L810 was the best choice for someone like me who does casual photography and wants to upgrade from an older camera.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Jessica C.
Reviews.Content: I debated on the comparable but lesser priced competitor and after advice from a few "professionals" I chose to pay a little more and get the NIKON. Definitely glad I did. Wow, what a camera! Beautiful, crisp, crystal clear pictures. Close ups and macros are spectacular. This is by far the nicest camera I have ever owned, and even though it is packed full of features, I found it fairly simple to use. The smart auto feature is great for point and shoot pictures. The 26X zoom is so powerful. I could zoom in enough to get a clear picture of a squirrel that I could barely see with my own eyes. The record video feature is great because there's not a dozen steps to get to it, just one button and boom, you are recording. This is as close as I think you can get to a "professional" camera without paying the "professional" price. Would reccommend it to anyone wanting a quality higher end camera without spending an arm and a leg.

Other than that, great camera and very happy with it.If you are going to do movies with it, I would recommend getting the SanDisk Extreme 32 GB SDHC Class 10 UHS-1 Flash Memory Card 45MB/s (SDSDX-032G-X46), anything less and you are going to be disappointed.I purchased this camera in November and gave it a good work out over the holidays and it performed like a well oiled machine for me.Some things I would like to see better:1. Less noise when I am zooming in and out while doing movies. It is picked up very well by the camera microphones.2. Have a manual option for zooming in and out so that I have more control over the speed of the zoom and where it stops.Bottom line:I would have no problem recommending this camera to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a great price!
Reviews.Author: RyanTT "BAZZINGA!!!"
Reviews.Content: I was simply looking for a camera to take good photographs and maybe even try my hand at some professional photography in the near future. This camera is a great product to start with. it does not shoot in RAW but the image quality is just as great to work with.The learning curve is pretty low, which is a good thing, there are many preset features for different shooting situations, from all-purpose shots to sports to fireworks/night shots. As I mentioned the fireworks mode, it would be good for me to note on this particular setting the camera's shutter speed is at its max of 4 seconds. I make mention of this because I know some folks may want to try their hands at light painting. Four seconds is more than enough to get a word or 2 in and with enough practice and experience you will be creating perfect light painted images each time. It must also be noted that for optimum performance natural daylight is the best time to take photographs with this camera, the images are shot at its best, crisp and clear.What I like the most is the ability to get just the right amount DOF needed for commercial product photography. Once you have proper lighting and a tripod or anything that will keep your camera steady, most if not all your shots will be near perfect.For what it's worth, the 720p recording works fine. My only gripe with it, is that the autofocus does not work on items that are  within 1-5cm of the lens. I guess I may need to try a macro lens and see if it would make a difference. Other than that, for general video recording it works just fine.All in all, for it's price and size the COOLPIX L810 is worth the buy. It will be the perfect gift for any budding photographer.
