Reviews.Content: I've had only one other digital camera before this one, which was so-so and more expensive.  I love this one!!  More zoom, easier to use, takes super pictures.

Reviews.Title: Love at first sight, second sight, 3rd sight
Reviews.Author: JD Skater 13
Reviews.Content: Who doesn't love purchasing an item and expect to get what you pay for. But, what about those few occasions when you get so much more than you bargained for? Yes sir!!!... this is one of those few items I kept falling in love with the more I played with it.I have a Nikon SLR professional camera, outdated but a great one. This digital is the way to go when you just can't quite get the couple thousand bucks it takes to replace your SLR with a equal digital.  Thus far I have loved every feature. The only thing I am getting used to is the auto zoom, but it does not play around too much, as many others do. And it does do a final zoom when you shoot. So no blurry pictures yet.I was fortunate to get this on sale before the xmas rush, but if had to pay regular price for it... I definitely would. Worth every penny.I must add... The instructions for set up are so simple a 6year old would be able to do it. So if you are a beginner, all you need to do is follow the step by step instructions and you'll be taking pictures within a half hour.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: TinaTinaBoBina
Reviews.Content: My new camera is just as great as I had hoped it would be and I am so glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Zoom!
Reviews.Author: @FotosyPaisajesV
Reviews.Content: Excellent!This is my second camera ... and the first is a compact 3X Zoom ...It's amazing how far reaching the optical gain has. This is the main point and greatest attribute.What I do not like is that you can not set long exposure shots, and you must wait a few seconds before looking at the pictures while the camera stores.Sure, this team is focused on other things like zoom.In general terms I recommend if you want to take pictures of distant objects.Then I'll upload the photos to be taken in my blog: fotosypaisajesdevenezuela.blogspot.com___________________________Excelente!Esta es mi segunda cámara... y la primera es una compacta de 3X de Zoom...Es increible la distancia que alcanza el aumento optico que tiene. Este es su punto principal y mayor atributo.Lo que no me gusta es que no se pueden programar disparos de Larga Exposición, y que se deben esperar unos segundos antes de revisar las fotos mientras la cámara las almacena.Claro, este equipo está enfocado en otros elementos como el zoom.En lineas generales la recomiendo si quieres tomar fotos de objetos alejados.Luego subiré las fotos que vaya tomando en mi blog: fotosypaisajesdevenezuela.blogspot.com

Reviews.Title: Nikon Camera
Reviews.Author: Suzq
Reviews.Content: I received my camera on time and it was exactly what I ordered,  I tried it out right away and liked it. am happy with thepurchase.

Reviews.Title: Full color
Reviews.Author: Edwin Chango
Reviews.Content: Fotos nítidas, muy fácil de usar y la pude configurar en mi idioma en español. Excelente calidad y por el costo creo es bastante razonable. Saludos desde Ecuador

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: AJSTLS
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and she absolutely LOVES it! Well worth the money! She has gotten some great shots using it. Even action shot at soccer games and such! Great camera for the intermediate photographer!

Reviews.Title: great pictures
Reviews.Author: L. J. Skena
Reviews.Content: We got this  after havnig a digital camera that finally gave up after 10 years.  This takes really good pictures but we have had to send it into Nikon for repair for it not focusing properly and it kept giving an error message.  It was still under warranty so they are taking care of it.

Reviews.Title: excellent product would recommend
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: muchas cosas buenas que decir de la nikkonexcelente mterialmuy buen zoomcalida en las imagenes y el 3D esta muy bien lgradoexcelente

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Javier I. Villegas "Javier"
Reviews.Content: This is the camera I was locking for many years. something between a pocket and a pro. the 26x zoom is great

Reviews.Title: camara
Reviews.Author: Andres Mora
Reviews.Content: muy bueno recomendado el producto yh me llego completo buena resol colr grabracion a a a a a a a

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Judimar D. Sosa Torres
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, I would use it for my Job, so I hope you can find something Excellent like I do

Reviews.Title: Love my new camera
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Garcia
Reviews.Content: I just love this camera and i got to say customer support is great if you e-mail them they answer right away the product came with all items mentioned in the description. This camera takes amazing shots. Im a photographer in the midium level i would say and this camera met my spectations.  Love it and you will too.

Reviews.Title: No manual focus option
Reviews.Author: Deidre
Reviews.Content: Maybe I should have read reviews from other sites on this camera before purchasing it at Amazon.I was really looking for a function that would allow me manually focus for that professional look - the "oomph factor". This camera did not provide that function. Also, it did not come with a carrying case.On the good side, it came with four batteries (non rechargeable) and it really does take good quality pictures - although I bet I could have done the same thing with another camera half its size. Delivery was also quick!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Lisa Merow
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very good pictures on the automatic focus mode.  I need more practice on adjustings the settings manually but it is fun to use.

Reviews.Title: 100% RECOMENDADA
Reviews.Author: Maberlyne Bastardo
Reviews.Content: Excelente!.. Una producto que vale la pena invertir, para aquellas personas que quieran dar sus inicios en el mundo de la fotografia se las recomiendo 100%. El color es precioso y llamativo.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: none
Reviews.Content: Overall, fantastic, easy to learn to use, wide range of uses produce useable results. Will suggest this to friends and family

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX L810
Reviews.Author: ginnyb
Reviews.Content: The memory card and batteries are in the same location and  it can be difficult to open the compartment and keep the batteries intact while putting the memory card in or out.  The zoom is also a little slow to focus but overall it is a very nice camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazon's Gift to "Shutter Bugs"
Reviews.Author: Chiseler
Reviews.Content: Sesveral months ago one of my children asked me to recommend a camera for her. I researched all the name brands available on the internet and did a comparison for the type of camera needed.  I was so impressed with the Nikon I bought one for myself.  Yes, this is just the camera I need.  I have A large camera with telephoto lenses but after using the Nikon I find I really don't need the other camera much at all.  The Nikon is very light weight and compact in comparison.  I purchased the case for it with enough room to carry essentials so I don't need a purse when taking tours or visiting areas to photo.  The resolution is good for enlarging and the zoom gives you flexibilty in an instant.  In other words it is one of the best camera purchases you can make. With active Great Grandhchildren I am able to use the Movie Record function and capture not only their movements but their voices.I would certainly recommend the Nikon Coolpix L810.  Great features and easy to use.  The only function I would like it to include would be an adjustable moniter screen for overhead shots.

Reviews.Title: Major focus issues
Reviews.Author: Casedawg
Reviews.Content: At first glance seems to be great camera for the money. It's capable of taking excellent pictures, but they are few and far between. Has major focusing issues and 90 percent of pictures taken come out blurry. The 10 percent that are not blurry are very nice.  My wife and I have taken at least 2000 pictures with this and have been so let down. Would not recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: pretty nice
Reviews.Author: snow!
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a trip I was taking. The setup was really simple, and the camera is simple to use. I love all of the features it has. I feel like Nikon has made it simple to do everything with this product. It even comes with a lens cover and a lanyard. The only faults I found were the flash having to pop up to take photos with the flash, and the camera takes batteries. I would rather have a battery pack or an internal battery. I enjoy this camera though, and it was worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Sharpness at medium and close ranges
Reviews.Author: David G. DiLucca
Reviews.Content: It takes a lot of experimentation to get the sharpness expected from a Nikon camera, I have yet to get good results.  This is my fourth digital camera, after many years of shooting film (35 & 120).  My next try will be with a tripod w/o vibration minimizer, which may interfere with sharp focus.  Mostly, I shoot outdoors (no flash) and some macro.  No portrait yet, nor best of 10 mode or auto smile finder.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Bamsk896
Reviews.Content: We have had this camera for a couple weeks now and it works great!  The only thing my wife complains about is that it is too heavy, but she is a small woman.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Ruben Mayorga
Reviews.Content: is easy to use and it is really powerful, I love this camera. It have a simplify menu, a very nice resolution and an excellent zoom, the battery level is awesome, I have more than 3 days using this camera and I do not have the necessity to recharge the batteries, it is amazing

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: TK
Reviews.Content: I had concerns about this camera after reading reviews from photography sites. But with lots of features , a veryreasonable price,good looks & its a Nikon I decide to give it a try . I think it makes very good pictures and iseasy to use . You don't have to know much about cameras to take good pictures . Works good for taking up closepictures from a distance (school graduations,music concerts & vacation shots). I am very happy with this camera,itis the best camera I have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: great camera for starters!
Reviews.Author: ArsInc24
Reviews.Content: This camera offers a ton of value for a great price. We use it to take pictures of jobs it provides great resolution. The camera got here extremely fast as well.

Reviews.Title: Broke in Less than 100 photos
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Anonymous"
Reviews.Content: The camera has nice features, but mine died after less than 100 pictures. Unfortunately, the warranty ran out, so I can't get it fixed without spending a lot of money. This is very disappointing as I was in the middle of an Alaskan vacation when it happened. I can't recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: coolpix L810
Reviews.Author: big jack
Reviews.Content: Really like this camera,smaller than the cannon sx40 and at almost half the price,the only thing that bugs me is the lens sticks in the out position every now and then and you have to turn on and wiggle the lens at the same time,also leaving the lens cover on and forgetting to take it off when you turn the camera on will get frustrating also but overall I really like it for the price,thanx big jack

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: typeguy
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get something a little better than the typical point and shoot that I've been getting my girlfriend over the past three years. After reviewing different cameras, this was the best choice: financially and creatively. She loves to take photographs of everything and loves this camera. We have been at concerts, sitting a little towards the back, but the photos she has taken feel like you're in the first few rows. I would recommend this camera to everyone who wants an affordable camera.

Reviews.Title: nikon L810
Reviews.Author: Mr, ZR1
Reviews.Content: Really nice camera. I like the many features it has and easy to select them. Its light weight. Nice zoom lenes, 40mm to 104mm. It does not eat batteries like my Canon. I would buy this camera for another person.

Reviews.Title: NIKON COOLPIX L810
Reviews.Author: Terry A. Freed
Reviews.Content: The NIKON L810 is very easy to use and takes what I think are very good pictures.  The Zoom brings the subject very close and so far I'm very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for stills & landscapes
Reviews.Author: JennSilac
Reviews.Content: I wanted to upgrade my old coolpix from 10 to 16MP. Wow... what a difference. This is by far the best quality camera I've ever owned. It takes amazing close ups (which i do a lot) and landscapes. This is not a great camera for action, bc sometimes you have to take the picture more than once. The video is decent quaility too! For the money, it is a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: CBM
Reviews.Content: Camera is a great value. It is easy to operate, and it takes great photos. The best part is that it uses AA batteries, so if they run out while you're on vacation you can buy replacements just about anywhere. The only complaint is that it must be held very still to get a clear shot, but it is a nice camera overall.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: A good choice for someone wanting an above average camera that isn't too expensive. Once you learn the settings (which are easy to understand and operate) you can get a lot out of it.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera I ever owned.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Guy
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend this camera.  Zoom is great, easy to use, pictures came out better than I thought.  Just love it.  It came in just as we were getting ready to go away on vacation for several weeks.  Found that it was light enough to carry everywhere we went, pictures were quick enough to use at sporting events and finally worked just fine for portrait type shots as well.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding camera
Reviews.Author: Dusty Rhodes
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera after seeing pictures taken by a friend who has one. This is 'da bomb' as far as picture clarity and detail and unbelievable zoom. Just follow the instructions that come with it for great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: Constance J. Zulaica
Reviews.Content: I bought my husband this camera for Christmas and have not given it to him as yet. I received it ahead of time and it was just as advertised. I would recommend this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice bridge camera
Reviews.Author: J. Brown
Reviews.Content: I just recieved this camera last week and from the time I took the camera out of the box i was very impressed. I've read alot of reviews and watched a few youtube videos and the only reason that i can see that this is a hard camera to use is that people don't want to read instructions to learn how to use the camera. Most camera (for example Kodak) don't give a manual. So the fact that Nikon gives you a manual and a cd is pretty good.The camera comes in 3 colors-red-black-blue.It's not heavy. It takes nice pics and it even reminds you to remove the lens cap.If you use the auto mode the camera does all the work. Finally this bridge camera-A cross between a professional camera and a point and shoot.  This camera is nice for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for What I Need
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for what I need. I use it to take videos and pictures of my daughter and they come out great! This does not have detachable lenses but what I want is just great pictures and that's what this camera does. Very lightweight and small compared to my wife's cannon rebel xt. I would recommend this product but make sure you buy rechargeable batteries and a big SD card (preferably 32gb). Also a tripod if you dont already have one.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Excelent price for this camera, every single picture is amazing using this camera. Great zoom, great pictures and compact. The LCD is really clear, remember to buy an SD card

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Sandra Brooks
Reviews.Content: Love the camera.  It totally meets the needs of my level of photography.  Has a zoom lens, large display, and the pictures turn out perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Brian M. Kilbert
Reviews.Content: Haven't tested all the features yet, but love it so far.  User friendly, great quality pics, great value.  It's a great "point and shoot" camera!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot of features and takes great photos.  It holds nicely in your hand (if you're right-handed), has really good zoom, and takes great video as well (was surprised at how clear the audio was).

Reviews.Title: Nice and efficient
Reviews.Author: Hugo
Reviews.Content: Thanks I was looking for a nice and efficient digital camera.  Nikon Coolpix L810 is just what I was looking for.Best regardsHugo Vergara

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: sakofv
Reviews.Content: It is a good camera with a lot of prefixes controls to take photos but there have not a manual mode.

Reviews.Title: Really good camera, but i was waiting for more
Reviews.Author: Serhii
Reviews.Content: Camera is really nice. Shipping was extreamly fast. I found this camera very cool. Pictures is beautiful and sharpy. Zoom had extends my expactation. Everything is cool except of focusing. It's really slow. Also camera saving speed is quite slow. No matter if i bought a fast memory card it's stil saving slow. It's not a big problem, camera is stil nice.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!
Reviews.Author: Tamara Baranek
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera! The pictures and videos come out sooo clear!!!! I love the ease of use too!

Reviews.Title: Nikon
Reviews.Author: wfr1956
Reviews.Content: Love, Love, Love this camera.  I have had 2 digital cameras in the last 10 years.  The first one my husband paid over 600.00 for.  I was hooked on this camera.  I bought the exact one on ebay a couple of years ago as a backup.  I finally decided it was time for a new camera.  I did some research and found this Nikon.  Everything about it I love.  The batteries are lasting forever.  I use it for ebay sales, we took it on vacation and took over 100 pictures plus videos.  The batteries still read strong.So that being said I have nothing at all bad to say about this camera......My daughter kept saying I want this...

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great service.
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived swiftly and I couldn't wait to get home the day it was delivered. I've had it for about a month now and it's been great! Definitely use the manual open flash in darker situations, but if you don't, it creates these neat surreal photos. So far, it is only a little wonky in the super bright daylight. It's just a bit washed out -- but all photos are. Great camera!

Reviews.Title: Zoom is the best!
Reviews.Author: Jane Says...
Reviews.Content: Great Camera for the Zoom.  Pictures look nice.  Doesn't work well if you want to snap several pictures fast.  Overall, simple to use.

Reviews.Title: Coolbeans.
Reviews.Author: reverse
Reviews.Content: Awesome. It came just like it was supposed to. If you're looking for a nice, cheap alternative to a point & shoot this is your camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: William Jose Jurado V "willyju"
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, cool picture full of color. I love this camera, is small enough and ligth perfect for really good not professinal pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera From Amazon
Reviews.Author: LT
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything I wanted and more.  The zoom is perfect for those shots you can't get close to and the 16.1 MP makes the photo's look professionally done.  Fun to use, light weight and because of the design it is very easy to hold onto and take pictures.  Would definitely recommend this product to friends, it's also easy to use for beginners who like to experiment and play around.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L810
Reviews.Author: DJ Dan
Reviews.Content: Great Camera, Very Easy to use, Only thing that would make it better is if it had a swivel display!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L810
Reviews.Author: Vron
Reviews.Content: Great camera, just what I needed when my old one die, good zoom and the color come out great, even my kids (9 yrs) know how to use it.

Reviews.Title: Great Nikon camera for a great price
Reviews.Author: josue farrugia
Reviews.Content: I got this camera with a great deal and as all nikon cameras this one also take great photos I would really recommend this camera for any amateur photographer with a low amount of cash

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Bestbuddy50
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent! I got it as a graduation gift about 2 months ago and I am already taking great pictures and making memories! As a college student who will be studying abroad, this camera is ideal! It's a professional camera for non-professionals! It is so lightweight and the fact that it is battery operated makes it ideal for those always on the go! I would recommend this camera to anyone! The only down side to this camera is that I haven't figured out if you can change the shutter speed, because sometimes the camera takes it's time to snap the shot.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Ngoc
Reviews.Content: Pro:Camera 16MP720P HD Record26x ZoomQuad Double AA batteries.Good looking for price.got it for $160 Bucks on Sale.Con:Fail Focus.Take picture really slow.Blur when zoom in and out.Pc to Camera cable too short.This camera could be really really good if the focus were good. like seriously worst focus than my Nokia phone :D.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: salyers88
Reviews.Content: This is my first Coolpix camera and I have only taken a few shots with it so far but it seems to be in focus with every shot just as long as you follow the directions I do not anticipate any issues. The one thing that I do not like is that it does not come with a free editing software like the Fuji cameras do or I would have given it at least five stars.

Reviews.Title: Great Piotos
Reviews.Author: Captain Al
Reviews.Content: The camera does take great photos and it is not a point and shoot.  There is many selections as to the type of photo to be taken -  close-up landscape, action and more.  Wish that I had bought a camera with a view finder because holding the unit up to the eye makes it more stable.  I have trouble holding the camera steady when viewing the scene via the display screen.

Reviews.Title: Get it on sale
Reviews.Author: Ksw287
Reviews.Content: Not good for action, the camera takes too long to focus. Decent quality pictures, it's what you should expect from this camera. Don't buy for zoom, while it zooms far, getting a focused picture is very difficult.

Reviews.Title: about the Nikon Coolpix L810
Reviews.Author: Gustavo f.
Reviews.Content: I like the nikon L810, it full filled my expectations and more.I used it, and i think is a good toy for me and for all the people who likes taking photos.

Reviews.Title: lcd screen
Reviews.Author: Jackson M.
Reviews.Content: i like the camera but outside the reflection keeps me from seeing what i want to photograpf, is there some kind of snap on viewing tube to block out the reflections? i was told that there was. usually i just get myself looking back at me. i can't always tell if the focus square is green or whatever.today i had to delete 27 pictures because they were out of focus. if there is such an animal could you let me know? other than that problem i do like the camera.

Reviews.Title: It's OK but...
Reviews.Author: LISA LOU "LISA MARIE"
Reviews.Content: I dropped and broke my wonderful easy to use orange Panasonic Lumix and was devastated because it was such a great little point and shoot camera. However, I decided I wanted a camera with a lot more zoom since I was going on vacation with my dad who won't let anyone take his picture. I figured I could sneak pictures from a long ways away and he wouldn't even know it.Ironically, while my dad was here visiting and then going on the trip with us, he decided to buy this same camera but in blue.So after recieving the cameras my husb and I read the manual (skimmed thru it as best we could with limited time) and thought we could just turn it on and point and shoot since we programmed it for our needs. My dad did the same thing too and we exchanged thoughts and tips.We went on our trip less than a week later and every time I would take a picture if would be completely blurry. Like the shutter speed was lagging. Our 20 yr old son fixed it for us and seemed to be better sometimes but either grainy or blurry. Needless to say I just let our son carry it around the whole entire trip on the ship and islands so that we'd have some decent pics. He seemed to understand and be more patient with the settings and modes for the situation (indoors, outdoors, lighting, etc) - so that was all good but I hardly got any pictures of him and it was his 21st birthday trip we were on.My dad didn't use his camera one single time on the trip because it was "way to big to carry around".After a month or so after getting home I went ahead and listed and sold it and bought me an easy to use point and shoot camera again. MUCH happier with it but sadly, no great zoomage. Oh well, at least I have a good little camera now with a fast shutter speed.And as for my dad, he ended up giving his brand new blue one to my son (his grandson) for his 21st bday since my son seemed to love it so much. He still loves it btw and has had it since Sept 2012.If you are wondering the little great camera I ended up settling with is the: Samsung DV300F Dual View Smart Camera - Silver/Red (EC-DV300FBPRUS) which I bought right here on Amazon (of course!!). It is cool because I can now see if taking a pic of myself and my husb or even my dog that I'm holding. It is fun and it works great!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L810 is a winner!
Reviews.Author: Bad Bill
Reviews.Content: I was looking to move up from my Point and Shoot, but not quit ready for a DSLR, I picked the Nikon Coolpix L810.  I spent a lot of time reading the reviews and watching youtube videos before making the decision.  Each camera I researched had its' pluses and minuses.  But, for a total picture, the L810 has it all, ease of use, great videos and stunning photos.  When you add the exceptional price value, it was a no brainer.  I highly recommend the Nikon Coolpix L810.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Maria Paz Rivero
Reviews.Content: If you want this camera for inside photography do not purchase it. pictures come out yellow, and pictures come out blury even when taking a still picture

Reviews.Title: Unreliable and slow
Reviews.Author: Frank C. Branchini "beatlefanfcb"
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with this camera.  It is completely unreliable.  Occasionally you can get amazing photos.  But you are just as likely to take a photo of someone posing in bright sunlight and have it come out blurry.  Sometimes it works well, sometimes not.  That just isn't good enough.  The shutter speed is incredibly slow, even without flash.  If you are taking photos of animals the animal has time to turn completely around while you are waiting for the photo to actually take.  I have lots of shots of the back of people's heads for the same reason.  Photo quality is vastly inferior to the photo quality of any decent phone. The camera has numerous setting options, many of which are not the least bit obvious, and comes with no useful instructions to explain the choices. I'm ready to replace this camera and I won't buy another Nikon!

Reviews.Title: DON"T BUY THIS CAMERA!!!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Ascencios
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for a trip to Brazil - it arrived on time and in perfect condition.  However, the camera only takes photos SOMETIMES!  Co

Reviews.Title: Making Memories
Reviews.Author: banker10-4
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the purchase of this camera, I read a lot of reviews before deciding to get this specific one and am very happy that I did. The zoom is amazing! One thing I was looking for was a rechargeable battery, but after taking 150+ pictures with it I have not yet had to change the batteries. This camera is easy to use, make sure you read the manual. Happy Clicking A picuture is a Memory!

Reviews.Title: Such a Great Deal!!
Reviews.Author: Brandon Sale
Reviews.Content: My Wife is Sooo pleased with this camera and I couldnt be happier considering I bought a "used" L810 from Amazon and saved about $100. The camera was factory reconditioned and was, in my opinion, absolutely Brand New! Not a scratch on it and there was NO way to tell it had ever been owned before. The camera itself is very user-friendly with a ton of different "scene-modes". So if youre a point and shooter you have many different choices of pre-tuned settings for any lighting condition or setting imaginable. 16 megapixels produces very crisp pictures and should more than please any amateur or enthusiast and Nikon produces some of the best values on the market. Youll love the menu, the camcorder controls, the zoom, the audio when taking video and the feel and look of the camera. Its the perfect size and feels really good in my hands....not too big but alot better than a flat square point and shoot. We got the Red version which is a beautiful deep wine color that is better looking than any black camera we've ever owned, and I would totally recommend this color as people will notice it. Anyway, the camera is really great and the deal we got was incredible.  Happy Shooting......

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: lumpy
Reviews.Content: I did quite a bit of shopping around before buying this camera.  I couldn't be happier.  It takes great pictures and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I had never had a camera that worked so wonderfully! The picture/video quality is superb and it shipped faster than expected. Best camera owned!

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: ksprayberry
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for almost a year now.  I love the camera.  Its easy to use and auto focus is easy to use as well.  The clarity of the picture is excellent, however, I am not as happy with the picture qaulity in low light settings. You see a great deal of fuzz and the color is not great in low light settings.  Also, it's difficult to get a good picture when you use full zoom.  It's hand to stabalixe the camera so that the picutre is not blurry.  I have noticed also that you sacrifice some color when you use the zoom. Overall, I give the camera a 4 out 5.  Happy with the clarity of the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying it
Reviews.Author: Trinigal

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L810
Reviews.Author: Firtree
Reviews.Content: First off, I love the Blue.  It is very pretty.  Many compliments on the looks.  It is heavier than my other cameras so that was a little harder to get used too.  It does come with a neck strap, but after a while it starts to get uncomfortable, so I usually carry it with the strap wrapped around my wrist so I don't drop it.  So far, that has worked out well.Performance:  Takes great close up pictures.  Very clear and crisp.  I have the settings on maximum. (16MP 'Star', vivid color)  Not unhappy with that at all.  The 26X Zoom is a good feature too.  I am able to get 'closer' to the subject than my old 10x zoom Nikon.  Very easy to use, once you get used to it.  Many 'preset' options available.  Menu comes up quickly without a huge delay.  And, I have been able to take better shots than I have in the past (with my other cameras) so that is a big plus.  For a 'point and shoot' it is pretty good.Drawbacks that I have noticed so far: select a scene has a lot of different setting for a variety of situations, that is a good thing.  However, "Indoor Party" is not good.  I wish I would have used something else.  Lost some moments there that I will never get back.  Word of advice, practice with some of the other settings BEFORE that big event.  Also, it does not 'snap' pictures as quickly as I had hoped (although much faster than my other camera).  It has a setting for rapid sucession, BSS, which I like, but it just doesn't get it done quite up to my expectations.  Action shots have been blurry.  In all fairness though, I have not experimented with the sports setting in the select a scene section so that could be 'my bad'.Overall:  I like this camera.  It has a lot to offer.  Good solid performance for a Point and Shoot.  Affordable.  I suggest using rechargable batteries.  Carry spares.  It has a battery life icon but do not believe it.  It goes from showing a full charge to 'battery exhausted' in one picture.  I think with practice, one could really get some good shots out of this camera.  There are a lot of settings to experiment with, including white balance and ISO settings if you would like to get away from the manual presets.  If not, Smart scene and Select a scene has a lot of 'preset' options to choose from.All and all, though I am not thrilled, yet, I am not unhappy and I am really motivated to make this camera work for me.

Reviews.Title: Went defective in less than 45 days.
Reviews.Author: Steve K.
Reviews.Content: My story is below, but in short, my L810 camera went defective just beyond the 30 day return policy, and I'm now stuck with a $250-$300 paperweight. :(I owned a Nikon L5100 for a while and really loved it.  However, for an upcoming cruise I decided I wanted something with better megapixels, and better zoom options.  Because I was impressed with the quality of the L5100, I stuck with the brand name and bought the L810, receiving it on May 9, 2012.  My daily job doesn't require constant camera use, so it wasn't used much, just a picture here or there but I was VERY impressed with the quality of the images I was seeing, and the camera's ease of use.  I thought I had the perfect camera for my cruise, and I planned to better test it on a trip to Las Vegas in late June 2012.As a testament to the camera's power usage, the batteries that came with it lasted until 23 June (about a month and change from first power up).  Unfortunately I was at Hoover Dam (my first big scale test for the camera) when those batteries finally died.  Like any other good photographer, I carry spare batteries at all times.I put in a replacement set, and hit the power button.  The lens started its extraction process but then stopped, and then the camera shut off.  I'm thinking something simple (I double-pressed the power button by mistake, or maybe I hadn't closed the battery door fully so battery contact got lost).  I rechecked the batteries, they were fine.  Pushed the power button again, but now the power light comes on for about 5 seconds and then goes off.  There are no noises at all (no attempted motor noise for the lens, no clicks, nothing).  I also can't access any camera menus or see any indication on the screen within that short 5 second period.  The camera is simply dead, with the the lens locked in the external position so that I cannot even put the lens cap on to protect it.  I've looked for some sort of "reset" button on the camera that might drive the lens back to home position, cannot find one.  I even assumed I had a defective spare set of batteries, so I stopped by a convenience store for a new set on the way back to the hotel.  Still the same symptoms as before.Based on date of receipt, the camera is ONLY 45 days old, but 15 days beyond Amazon's return policy .  I'm also still in Vegas so I don't have the original box or cables with me (now I'm evening questioning if I kept the original box).  It appears I've lost the money I paid for this camera.  I'm also unsure how to safely transport it back home because of the exposed lens.  I was really optimistic about this particular camera.  Now I'm sitting in the hotel room in utter disappointment typing this review.  I have no way to capture pictures for the remainder of my trip,  and I don't have my camera for the cruise.  I'm also not sure if I want to spend the additional money to replace the same camera model (meaning I'd spend nearly $500 for one camera)...I highly recommend anyone buying this, get serious use of it everyday in the first 30 days.  If it goes defective, at least you'll be able to return it without a problem.  This almost feels like the "Murphy's Law" for purchases. It will always fail JUST after the warranty expires.

Reviews.Title: wildly disappointed!!
Reviews.Author: raincrowfarm
Reviews.Content: I will never consider buying another Nikon product after owning this camera. There is not even ONE picture I have in the last 6 months that was truly in focus.I HAVE read the manual as others have so snobbishly implied. I make my living in medical imaging and I am used to complicated glitchy imaging and making adjustments for image quality....but this camera frustrates me. I have sent it in for repairs twice now(in 6 mos.) The first time because the focus motor ground to a halt, and the second time because it would not focus--it just kept trying to focus and never would expose. Nikon service  sent it back to me explaining they could not find anything wrong with the camera and took "hundreds" of pictures without a problem. Evidently they were not trying to photograph a wiggly grandchild's first birthday, or possibly they don't care that the camera does not focus correctly--even when the lighting is good. Other reviewers have suggested playing with the cameras features to get good pics, but I disagree--it should work perfect right out of the box for the kind of money I shucked out for this thing.  I know what operator error looks like and this camera software is just plain poorly designed. A family member owns a Nikon Coolpix L18 with 3x zoom that takes wonderful pictures compared to the L810--save your money and buy a cheaper camera if you care about ease of use and image quality.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Bill9
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera formy wife for her birthday. This camera takes 4 AA batteries. The camera wouldnt turn on. I went to replace the batteries and the camera still didnt turn on. I talked to Amazon and my option is to contact Nikon warranty. This camera was purchased 45 days ago and is outsiide the Amazon return window which is only 30 Days. I will not be buying anymore electronics on Amazon. Costco has a great return policy and I willbe buying from them in the future. This camera obviously is poorly made.

Reviews.Title: ok but..no view finder is something I still have not adjusted  too.
Reviews.Author: Craig E. Guyer
Reviews.Content: The camera overall takes good pictures and does well in low light.  I have had it a few months and I am slowly learning what mode is best for each situation.  Normal I think.I like that there is a seperate button for video on/off from the snap a picture button.  This way it is easy to go from one to the other.Dislike.  The Camera seems slow to save to the memory card and I am fairly certain I have the higher speed card.  What is very bad is that if you try to take anothe image to quickly it seems to create a gap in a photo, with a whole row of pixels missing. The camera says please wait...but I think it should be much smarter and if it is not ready to take the next photo, do not let me.The other thing that really bugs me is not having a view finder.Taking all photos looking at the LCD like a smart phone is much harder than I thought, in bright light and it is hard to utilize the extreme zoom.  I know it is by design and I knew it when I bought it, but I thought I could live with it given the cheaper price, but regret not spending a little more and getting a camera with a view finder.There are 2 sliders to zoom the lense, one on the lense it self which I am guessing a left handed person would use more and the normal rotating thing right next to the shutter button.  I never use the slider on the lense and would be happy to trade that feature for the view finder.If I could I would return the camera and get another.

Reviews.Title: great looking camera
Reviews.Author: gramz56
Reviews.Content: I think I am really pleased with this camera, looks easy to set up and use.  Disappointed with the fact I didn't see the bundle pack, because I thought this came with the memory card and case.

Reviews.Title: I purchased this camera April 26, 2012 and now, just 7 weeks later it doesn't work.
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: My camera doesn't work!  7 weeks is all I got out of it.  I purchased it, printed and read the manual and practiced with it for 4 weeks, taking about 200 or so pictures -- my first trip out with the camera was to Venice, Italy - two days into shooting there, the camera started acting up.  I would remove the lens cap, turn the system on (as instructed) and it would take one picture, then I would take a second using the zoom in/out and suddenly it would say, "please remove the lens cap then turn on the camera."  The cap was off and the camera was on -- I had just taken a picture!  I turned the system on/off a number of time, checked the batteries, all kinds of troubleshooting checks, and it still works, or shall I say, doesn't work.....allowing me to take one picture (as long as I don't zoom in/out, then gives me the "remove the cap...." message.  I read the reviews and those these was not my first choice, I decided to go with a big name brand rather than the Fuji camera which was my first choice.  I am VERY DISAPPOINTED -- and because it exceeded Amazons 30 day return policy I can't do anything about it.  Makes we not want to use on-line ordering anymore.  If I had bought it at a local store I could have at least exchanged it -- Amazon tells me I can only get a partial refund, and won't even say how much!POOOOOH on you Nikon and your too AMAZON.Nikon COOLPIX L810 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 26x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass Lens and 3-inch LCD (Black)

Reviews.Title: Nikon customer service horrible
Reviews.Author: DESIREE MARISA SMALL
Reviews.Content: So my camera dropped just a few days before warranty was up. to think it was in the bad and had a small little dropped and stopped working. wanting to be honest I said  that I dropped it. Paid about $60 us to ship it from Barbados to America. After having to call to find out my quote seeing their were taking so long, I found out why it cost around $180.00 us to get it fixed, I asked the representative why it cost so much,,,,seeing that all I had to do was put a few more dollards and get a new one,,,, she was uncouth, or lets just simply say not nice, and told me that was the price. May I add that their website is not user friendly and trying to contact them I found it easier to call,,,,, for me an international user that is not cheap.....soooooo I then received  a quote in the mail then I saw the breakdown that shipping was costing me around $80 somethingUS and I was like,,, if only the young lady had explained this I would have been more understanding as to why it came to that much. Mind you I used UPS shipping thinking I had prepared shipping back to Barbados, only to find out that, they gave me wrong information more bad customer service. To make a long story short I end up calling Nikon several times only to be met with either rough customer service representatives who do not understand international customers.  I had a couple people lined up who were coming to Barbados where I would get them bring it for me on their way back from their vacation in NY, but they simply take too long to give details in terms of repairs and how long something would take. All in all I want a camera company who can respond fast and be understanding when I have a problem...........the camera works ok, but like some I have to agree the focus takes too long and you get some blury pictures along the way, but the customer representatives leaves a bad taste in my mouth for Nikon...they need to take a leaf out of Amazon's book.

Reviews.Content: Takes about a dozen (decent) pics before batteries die.I've seen numerous web posts re the stinking battery life.thin Cam should be recalled/replaced.If they don't fix this, Nikon hasscrewed any future prospect of me ever buying another of their products.

But they couldn't help me.  I guess I am the only person in the history of Target where they made a mistake. RIGHT, and I was born yesterday. Thank for letting me vent. I no longer shop at Target.

I probably could have looked into all the features and seen which settings to use for which situations, and looked into the auto-focus details, but I didn't. The auto-focus failed a lot and a decent amount of my photos came out blurry because it couldn't get into focus. But, I am just a camera-novice. If you're also a camera novice, you might want to go with a camera a little cheaper and simpler.

Reviews.Title: Had problem with Preview Screen
Reviews.Author: Kiran
Reviews.Content: It had problem with Preview screen. Whenever the cam is pointed near to a light source, it displays a pink line. It is very annoying and I believe that is defective cam. I have returned it, yet to get a refund.A perfect example is, point the camera on the road on a sunny day. When the cars move on the road, usually small amount of sun light reflects in many directions. If you are in one of that direction, then you would see a vertical pink line moving along with car (light source).Note that the pink line does not show up on the photos and rarely appears on the videos.

I am not a camera expert, so just me being able to use it not have a big problem using it is a big plus! I would highly recommend this camera for anyone.

Reviews.Title: not bad for the cost
Reviews.Author: Mathew Fields
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price, I definitely am looking to buy something higher in quality, possibly the Nikon D5100 slr. But for everyday uses and fun shooting it is great! I just really want that boost of high quality that I am not getting with the 810.

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Content: I got it and love the great picture quality and great video features. I have had a great time with this camera

Reviews.Title: Nikon L810

Reviews.Content: Llego justo a el día indicado, de las mismas características solicitadas, con todos los componentes completos, en excelentes condiciones, la información del ID dada para el seguimiento fue completa y hasta el aviso de haber arribado al punto de entrega.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix L810
Reviews.Author: amazoncustomer
Reviews.Content: This is easy to use, although some of the features are tough to find on the menu.The quality is great and it is very easy to use.Great on battery life, but not so great w/shutter speed.Even on the sports setting, the camera seems a little sluggish.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Pictures!
Reviews.Author: MegDev
Reviews.Content: I've taken pictures inside and outside and they came out looking so wonderful! I an looking forward to taking more.

Reviews.Title: Different than last...
Reviews.Author: DivineDiva
Reviews.Content: So far, I like this camera. However, I will say that I miss my Nikon Coolpix that was a touch screen. I believe once I continue to use and learn the in/outs of this camera, the pictures will definitely be better than my last Nikon. The pictures that I have taken thus far are not bad but I kind of expected more since this camera has more zoom options than my last camera.In due time, I will get the hang of it.

Reviews.Title: OMG !!!
Reviews.Author: DianeAudrey
Reviews.Content: IT JUST CAME IN ORDERED IT LIKE 3 DAYS AGO AND ITS HERE !!! ** FAST SHIPPING ** I HAVE BEEN PLAYING WITH THE CAMERA AND WOW ITS AMAZING , I AM JUST SO HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE , PICTURES LOOK SO PROFESSIONAL! I AM IN LOVE WITH THIS CAMERA !!!THANK YOU SO MUCH :)

Reviews.Title: OK camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Dennis J. Carney
Reviews.Content: I'm still not 100% sure as to what I think of the camera. 95% of the photos turn out great, but some of the photos taken even with the tripod under very calm conditions came out blurry. Half of the night photos came out great and the other half came out blurry while using a very sturdy tripod and calm conditions. The videos are ok, but the camera is constantly focusing causing some blurry videos and the setting's on the camera are simple. I may be doing somthing wrong but like I previously stated all the setting's are easy to understand so this review may be upgraded or downgraded at a later date.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Jo Bulfin
Reviews.Content: Details of photos are fantastic, camera is very easy to use and comfortable to hold and shoot.The videos are also easy to shoot and record.

Reviews.Title: excellent price
Reviews.Author: Elisos
Reviews.Content: i bought the blue camera for a great price, and it is a great product...it takes beautiful pictures and videos..

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: jensen
Reviews.Content: Got it on time. Nicely packed. Totally satisfied. Give five star rating for this product. Looking for more of similar purchases

Reviews.Title: this camera cannot focus right. thinking about returning it
Reviews.Author: Henry M "realshb"
Reviews.Content: Bot this for Dad last week. Blue color.and bot for myself AW100 for water sports.Two Nikons in one day.(quick background: I have used many Canons, Pentaxes, SONYs and Pana/Lumixes in the past.I used to develop my own black and whites, my first Camera was Canon Elan, an SLR.)These two are the first Nikons i got. Knowing it's a big brand, i fully expected excellent performance. WRONG.AW100 is okay. yet to take it to water, but it takes good dry pictures.L810 Blue is a nightmare. The focus is obviously defective. Not sure whether it's faulty at design level, or at manufacturing, or just my unit. It seldom focuses well on the first try. If you do get lucky and nail a real nice clear image in the LCD, as you push the shutter-button down to take the picture, the dam* thing will RE-focus again and almost surely take a fuzzy, bad picture.If anybody thinks I need to study the MANUAL to learn to set something "right" to make the best use of this camera, i must disagree. this is a point and shoot camera. It should come with the correct default setting. besides, this auto-focus behavior really should not happen under any setting.Most likely returning the L810.

Reviews.Title: Not SD card

Reviews.Content: The price looked great until I opened it and found there was not even a started SD card with the camera!!Very misleading!!

Reviews.Content: the best camera that my hands have ever touch and easy to use.la mejor camara que e tenido en mis manos, y muy simple para usarse sin tener que ajustar...

Reviews.Content: I  love the way this Camera works.Grate pictures..And the color of the Camera is grate .I have gotten grate revues on pictures I took of the west Oregon Cost .And it was overcast the day that I used this camera and grate out come.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: M. Rupert
Reviews.Content: I received my Nikon Coolpix L810 about a month ago, and am enjoying using it.  I have had no problems so far, and don't anticipate any. It's easy to use, and I'm having fun experimenting with the settings.  Love the red color, too!

Reviews.Title: The European Model - no warranty in US
Reviews.Author: L.E. House
Reviews.Content: DavisMAX shipped the European model.  Nikon does not support it in the US and it is not covered with the Nikon Warranty.  Both DavisMAX and Amazon refused to stand behind the product when it failed after 2 months.

Reviews.Title: it's pretty awesome...nope, nevermind
Reviews.Author: E.M.K. "crazygal28"
Reviews.Content: (I got this camera from Walmart yesterday morning and took maybe 50 pictures with the four batteries that for better indoor pictures. came in the box. Today at around 1pm after taking maybe ten pictures the batteries were dead and the camera turned off! I have never had batteries die so fast,so really going that the batteries in the box had been sitting for awhile... this is a very simple camera, and wishing the Canon powershot sx40 HS hadn't given up after first turning it on with the lens cap still on... no msg saying take lens cap off,just quit working so took it back to exchange for a Samsung wb150for, but that camera didn't have a battery charger, had to plug it into the wall to charge it. So far I'm happy with the L810 except battery life. Sorry to ramble. Okay, I have had this camera for more than two weeks, and I have read reviews about playing with the different scenes like using smart portrait setting for better indoor pics. The new batteries I put in lasted about 350+ pictures :-)  if the batteries are getting low the camera will have a harder time focusing or even zooming in, but anything with low batteries will most likely slow down, even your car.  Give this camera a chance and read reviews and also read the manual even if you think you know cameras)********* WELL,i now only use my panasonic lumix sz8 99 percent of the time except for indoor pics which turn out wonderful with this Nikon camera(for me at least). it is so much quicker and easier to use the panasonic and it is way smaller and focuses ALOT better and faster. kinda mad i didn't just get a replacement for my panasonic from the beginning,but by the time i figured that out it had been more than a few months and couldn't return the Nikon, boooooo

Reviews.Title: Product Delivery
Reviews.Author: kjctngy
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Nikon COOLPIX L810 and the camera was shipped in two days as promised.  However, the outside packaging had no sign of any damage to the package, but my dismay, when I opened the box, the actual camera box was severely crushed on one corner.  Additionally, the box was not sealed, the contents inside looked like someone has gone through the box and the camera was not neatly wrapped in it's usual bag if you will.  This camera was intended as Christmas present and there was no way I was going to give that to someone as a gift.  I decided to get a replacement, and a expected it's very easy to do this with Amazon, but the new dates for another camera was Dec 12-26th.  I had no choice but to cancel the order.  Not Happy!  :(

Reviews.Title: Its okay if you have nothing important to take pics of
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Bargainista"
Reviews.Content: Very Unhappy. Thought this might be a cheaper way to get the quality of a true DSLR, and I was mistaken. This picture was purchased to help capture the trip of a lifetime, and so many of my pictures returned slightly out of focus. I had read the manual, and was ready for the trip. On our trip we had so many missed pictures because I would hold down the capture button and sometimes it would take a few seconds to actually click  or not at all. Further more, whenever a photo was zoomed in the camera would refuse to focus properly at least 80% of the time. I know people said well you have to hold it halfway to focus and then click it, but it hardly ever held focus. I thought it may be a user error, but it seems that I'm not the only one who's ever had this problem with this camera. My husband tinkered with it quite a while and it was useless. A camera that can't hold a focus is ridiculous. We have so many perfectly framed pictures that just are as enjoyable because its fuzzy/grainy and slightly out of focus. I'm returning mine and just going all out for a great camera.Maybe if you can accept mediocre pictures, but I want quality.

Reviews.Title: This camera LOOKS nice but doesn't take clear photos!
Reviews.Author: WIFEnMOMMY0f2
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to receive this camera but I'm so upset! This camera rarely takes a nice clear photo. Thinking of returning it!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Rules
Reviews.Author: CA Wright
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera by mistake as I had originally intended to purchase the L120. Same price, less mega pixels but I've used that one before and fell in love. Maybe I'm strange. I'll continue to play with this on and hopefully it grows on me. I'm certain to eventually get the L120 though. Shrugs....I'll see how things go after my upcoming vacation.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Juan Esteban Espinoza Palacios
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA, I LOVE IT, AND IT GOT ON THE TIME THAT THEY TOLD ME.I'LL BE USING IT ALL ROUND....

Reviews.Title: coolpix L810
Reviews.Author: JC Walker
Reviews.Content: Can't review this product,it never did turn on,so I sent it right back! If you order this,I suggest getting the extended warranty!!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: amazonbuyer
Reviews.Content: I had a nikon coolpix for many years and loved it.  It finally broke after years of being dropped.  Although I had a basic model, I had bought it many yrs ago and cost more than this model.  I thought the upgrade would give us better pictures (although I was happy with the quality of pictures we had).  I was wrong.  I'm not sure if mine was faulty but on the screen the quality of pictures was poor, the color was off, and  and shutter time was long so if s/o moved it was very blurry.  Mind you, I never developed these pictures, this is all based on the scree.  I landed up returning this product and getting a basic nikon again for under $100 and I love the quality.

Reviews.Title: nicon Cool Pix Camera

Reviews.Content: I do not like this camera and wish that I could return it and get a full refund.  It was not what I expected.

Reviews.Content: WORST CAMERA EVER, IT IS ALMOST IMPOSIBLE TO GET AN ACCURATE FOCUS EVEN ON EASY MODE. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM. WANT AN EASY TO USE CAMERA, LOOK SOMEWHERE ELSE.

Reviews.Title: worthless product
Reviews.Author: doggie
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera for a trip.  put in the batteries and turned it on, took a few photos and the lens stuck open, and started flashing error message to take the len cap of that was not on.  the lens is still stuck half open and the camera will not work. had to return the item for refund, after I had to purchse another camera while I was on my trip, so I was out twice the money for the camera.

Reviews.Title: It's OK, but time will tell.
Reviews.Author: Robert N. Casey
Reviews.Content: I have not used the camera a great deal as yet, but the few pictures I have taken have been satisfactory so far.I have worked my way through the reference manual once but need to go through it again. There is a lot tolearn in order to use this camera successfully.I am happy with the size and feel of this camera. I have givenit a three star rating only because I have not used it a great deal as yet.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for kids...
Reviews.Author: roaeja "Hey you!"
Reviews.Content: If you are going to spend almost $300 for a this camera, I would recommendyour go for the Panasonic Lumix MSC FZ150 for a few hundred more.  Thiscamera isn't quite ready for primetime, the zoom is jerky and it kept comingup with 'battery exhausted', plus only records for 29 minutes, regardless ofhow many GB's you have available.If you want a REALLY GOOD CAMERA that will run circles around this one andzillion of options, fantastic pictures and 1080P video, the Lumix is the one.You will not be disappointed, I guarantee it.  Sue me, if I'm wrong.Panasonic DMC-FZ150K 12.1 MP Digital Camera with CMOS Sensor and 24x Optical Zoom (Black) $489.00  32X Zoom....I took a picture of my hallway, with nothing on but a nightlight and itcame out great!  Excellent low light camera.

Reviews.Title: misrepresentation
Reviews.Author: ephriam
Reviews.Content: After reviewing several cameras, I found that all reviews are the same except for the model numbers. Who is writing this falsehood? and how are we to believe anything that is being said about any of your products? Please correct this problem. I will not go by any reviews in the future as they are all false. Nikon COOLPIX L810 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 26x Zoom NIKKOR ED Glass Lens and 3-inch LCD (Black)alse.

Reviews.Title: Heavy on Price, light on features
Reviews.Author: C. Authement
Reviews.Content: Okay, when you buy this camera, be aware that you are buying the name Nikon, but not the Nikon quality. This camera's bell-and-whistle is the 26x zoom. It has HORRIBLE low-light and the entire camera just feels light-weight and more like an obligation than an actual product.I recommend either going the extra step and getting one of the Nikon entry-level/professional cameras or selecting a different model in this range. This camera is simply not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Doesnt work
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: I turned the camera on 3 times and now it will not work. I haven't put a memory card in it yet!  I went and bought new batteries and still it keeps telling me to remove the lens cover.  I needed this camera to take pictures at my daughters play. I paid extra to get it next day. I am so disappointed!5/8/2012 I got a replacement camera and it is working great!!! So far I love it! Now it deserves 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as my son is graduating this year. I used it for his senior prom pictures, which turned out okay but not great. This past week I tried to use it for an indoor chorus concert, which it sucked for. I have had this for a month and so far am not impressed at all. Really hoping that it takes some decent pictures for his high school graduation- it has let me down so far !

Reviews.Title: This camera is not worth the money. It's going back to the store
Reviews.Author: LAURA WHETSTINE
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera for my 50th birthday. I was so excited to get it until I actually got it up and running. First off the computer software included would not download kept getting a tiny screen that says press next but no next was seen on the screen could not make the pop up larger so that ticked me off right off the get go. The memory card goes in with the batteries??? Its hard to open and close correctly stupid. The 4 batteries it takes makes the camera heavy. The flash has to be popped up manually and then you have to push a button each time for the flash to actually work. All my photos came out like crap. Tried different settings, increased the light still pictures looked horrible. This camera is going back. I'll stick to my 10 year old kodak which doesn't take the best photos anymore but it's a 100 times easier to operate,lighter and it has a docking station.  Very disappointed with this camera.

Reviews.Content: i want to know, why don't you send me the item? i have paid it 2 day ago. why? i need a answer
